text:
The 2017 Oscars after parties – in pictures   View more sharing options Share   Close 
After a chaotic ceremony, in which Moonlight eclipsed La La Land at the eleventh hour to win best picture, where did Emma Stone, Barry Jenkins and other stars head to, clutching their Oscars tightly?
• Oscars 2017 winners: the full list 

Joanna Ruck 
Monday 27 February 2017 11.14 GMT Last modified on Monday 27 February 2017 11.23 GMT 

The Vanity Fair Oscar party gets under way Photograph: Danny Moloshok/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Kate Bosworth arrives at the Vanity Fair Oscar party Photograph: Farrell/BFA/Rex/Shutterstock
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Emma Stone, who won the Oscar for best actress, at the Governors Ball Photograph: Angela Weiss/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Models Poppy Delevingne (left), Georgia May Jagger (centre), with Jerry Hall and Elizabeth Jagger (right) at the Vanity Fair Oscars party Photograph: Kevin Mazur/VF17/WireImage
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Tom Ford, Katy Perry and Allison Williams strike a pose at the Vanity Fair party Photograph: Dave M Benett/VF17/WireImage
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Nicole Kidman, who missed out on the best supporting actress award to Viola Davis, at the Governors Ball with her husband, Keith Urban Photograph: Powers Imagery/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Reese Witherspoon chats to Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux at the Vanity Fair party Photograph: Kevin Mazur/VF17/WireImage
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Busy Philipps and Ruth Negga, who missed out on the best actress Oscar to Emma Stone, catch up at the Governors Ball Photograph: Angela Weiss/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Viola Davis, with her award for best supporting actress for her role in Fences, with her husband, Julius Tennon, at the Governors Ball Photograph: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Charlize Theron, Helen Lasichanh, Pharrell Williams and Salma Hayek at the Vanity Fair party Photograph: Kevin Mazur/VF17/WireImage
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Dominic Cooper, Cynthia Erivo, Lucas Hedges get the party started at the Governors Ball Photograph: Powers Imagery/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Samuel L Jackson joins in a selfie with Moonlight stars Alex R Hibbert and Jaden Piner at the Governors Ball Photograph: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

A quick change of outfit for Emma Stone as she attends the Vanity Fair party Photograph: Mike Coppola/VF17/Getty Images for VF
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Trudie Styler, Elton John, Sting, Sandra Brandt and David Furnish at the annual Elton John Aids Foundation’s Academy Awards viewing party Photograph: Michael Kovac/Getty Images for EJAF
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Mahershala Ali with his best supporting actor Oscar (for Moonlight) and Justin Timberlake (who missed out on the Oscar for best song) at the Vanity Fair party Photograph: Dave M Benett/VF17/WireImage
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Barry Jenkins makes an entrance at the Vanity Fair party with his Oscar for Moonlight, which won best picture Photograph: PA
